analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xdea5379f215aec2b532c950dffa4df8f76a05cb4.sol:
	Contract SushiCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xdea5379f215aec2b532c950dffa4df8f76a05cb4.sol#235-236)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0xdea5379f215aec2b532c950dffa4df8f76a05cb4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/29/0xdea5379f215aec2b532c950dffa4df8f76a05cb4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0xdea5379f215aec2b532c950dffa4df8f76a05cb4.sol#105-106) is not in mixedCase
